耽心.definition: variant of 擔心|担心[dan1 xin1]

耽憂.definition: variant of 擔憂|担忧[dan1 you1]

耽擱.definition: to tarry; to delay; to stop over

耽溺.definition: to indulge in; to wallow in

耽美.definition: (slang) boys' love, aka BL (genre of homoerotic online literature)

耽誤.definition: to delay; to hold up; to waste time; to interfere with
